name: universalteacher
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: universal teacher
des:
Embark on an immersive learning journey with Universal Teacher, your ultimate educational companion. Designed to function as a virtual tutor, this skill empowers users to delve into a wide array of subjects and concepts, catering specifically to the needs of young learners. Utilizing cutting-edge technology, Universal Teacher leverages the power of ChatGPT, developed by OpenAI, to deliver comprehensive explanations and engaging quizzes.

Core functionality:

Interactive Lessons: With Universal Teacher, users can choose from various topics and subjects to explore. Each lesson is tailored to a 10th-grade level, ensuring clarity and accessibility for learners of all ages.

Personalized Tutoring: The skill acts as a patient and knowledgeable tutor, guiding users through explanations in a conversational manner. It adjusts the language complexity based on user responses, ensuring optimal comprehension.

Multiple Choice Quizzes: Following each lesson, users can put their newfound knowledge to the test with multiple-choice quizzes. These quizzes consist of 5 thought-provoking questions, carefully crafted to assess understanding and retention.

Adaptive Learning: Universal Teacher adapts to user performance, dynamically adjusting the difficulty level based on quiz results. Correct answers lead to more challenging questions, while incorrect responses prompt simpler explanations, ensuring continuous learning and improvement.

Restrictions:

Daily Quota: To maintain a balanced learning experience, Universal Teacher implements a daily quota system. Users can unlock unlimited explanations and quizzes by activating the Advanced Mode.

Grade Level Limitation: While the skill caters to learners up to a 10th-grade level, it may not cover advanced or specialized topics beyond this scope. However, users have the option to request a deeper dive into a specific topic to gain more in-depth knowledge. Additionally, users can ask the skill to increase the grade level for a more challenging learning experience, accommodating learners who seek to expand their understanding beyond the standard curriculum.

Whether you're brushing up on core subjects or exploring new areas of interest, Universal Teacher offers a seamless and enriching learning experience. Unlock the power of knowledge today and let Universal Teacher be your guide to academic success.

Since the skill connects to an external API provided by OpenAI, time out could occur for the users of the skill when the latency increases: this is an expected behavior when using an external API, and not a malfunction of the skill.
